Why is it important to build self-reliance while you are young, and how can this prepare you to serve the Lord and others in the future?
Answer: So you can build your own personal testimony.

Question: Why is it important to build self-reliance while you are young, and how can this prepare you to serve the Lord and others in the future?
Answer: Building self reliance allows you to not worry when things are uncertain while still allowing you to be mature and help others

Question: Why is it important to build self-reliance while you are young, and how can this prepare you to serve the Lord and others in the future?
Answer: It is important to build self reliance when you are young because it can prepare you to serve the lord in ways he sees fit. This can prepare us to serve the lord by helping us build our testimonies and strengthen our faith. Also memorizing scriptures helps us when we need a quick answer to a question.
